text: @realDonaldTrump You know it doesn’t help giving conflicting information to people.  I have always supported you.  But why are you playing games with peoples minds and livelihoods? Is the virus dangerous or not?! #COVID19 @brithume @GeraldoRivera @ScottGottliebMD @dbongino @chadfelixg @seanmdav
